definitions.definition: Of or relating to school ; academic
examples: This award is for the greatest scholastic achievement by a graduating student.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to the philosophical tradition of scholasticism
Characterized by excessive subtlety , or needlessly minute subdivisions; pedantic; formal.

main_definition: Of or relating to school ; academic
secondary_definitions: ( philosophy ) Of or relating to the philosophical tradition of scholasticism
Characterized by excessive subtlety , or needlessly minute subdivisions; pedantic; formal.
